donations.name: UNRWA
donations.description: The UN agency for Palestine Refugees, providing food, education, and shelter across Gaza.

donations.name: Medical Aid for Palestinians (MAP)
donations.description: Provides emergency medical care, supplies, and long-term health services to Palestinians.

donations.name: Islamic Relief Worldwide
donations.description: Delivers urgent humanitarian assistance including food and medical aid to families in Gaza.

donations.name: Palestine Children's Relief Fund (PCRF)
donations.description: A non-political organization providing free medical care for sick and injured children.

donations.name: Doctors Without Borders (MSF)
donations.description: Offers impartial medical assistance in response to the humanitarian crisis in Palestine.

donations.name: Anera
donations.description: Focuses on long-term health, education, and economic development projects in Palestine.

donations.name: UNICEF
donations.description: A UN agency providing children and families in Gaza with life-saving essentials like food, water, medical care, and mental health support.

donations.name: International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC)
donations.description: A neutral organization providing urgent medical care, supplies, and repairing essential services like water and sanitation in Israel and the Occupied Territories.

donations.name: World Food Programme (WFP)
donations.description: The UN's food-assistance branch, scaling up operations to provide emergency food, bread, and wheat flour to families in Gaza.

donations.name: Save the Children
donations.description: Delivers immediate life-saving aid, food, water, and medical care, as well as long-term psychological support and safe spaces for children in Gaza.

donations.name: International Rescue Committee (IRC)
donations.description: Provides urgent care, food, shelter, and basic supplies to families fleeing conflict in crisis zones, including Gaza.

donations.name: Oxfam
donations.description: Distributes food, clean water, sanitation, and hygiene kits, while also providing trauma counseling and cash assistance.

donations.name: CARE
donations.description: Provides direct humanitarian relief in Gaza, focusing on delivering vital aid, medical care, water, and food to displaced families.

donations.name: Palestine Red Crescent Society (PRCS)
donations.description: The primary provider of emergency medical and ambulance services in Palestine, operating hospitals and health centers.

donations.name: Mercy Corps
donations.description: Delivers lifesaving relief, emergency items, and cash assistance to help families in Gaza purchase essential supplies.
